game.name: Mind Scraper
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 마우스 전용 옵션, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Mind Scraper is a story-driven graphic adventure. Play as Robert and dive into dying minds—built from unresolved regrets—to explore memories and learn why those choices were made.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Mind Scraper is a story-driven graphic adventure. Play as Robert and dive into dying minds—built from unresolved regrets—to explore memories and learn why those choices were made.
